author: USA TODAY, Erin Jensen, USA TODAY
title: Andy Cohen shares coronavirus update, reflects on 'the very worst part of this entire thing'
description: Andy Cohen says his son Benjamin, born in Feb. 2019, is "great" and his nanny tested negative for coronavirus.
content:
